title: How to Get the Fist of Darkness in Blox Fruits: Easy Guide

steps.title: Defeat a Sea Beast.
steps.content: Defeat a Sea Beast. This is the easiest way to get the Fist of Darkness, but it is considered a rare drop. You may need to defeat dozens of Sea Beasts before obtaining one. The Fist of Darkness can only be found in the Second Sea . Use a boat to find Sea Beasts. You can either sail around to find one, or stay in a single spot and wait for one to spawn. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open a Chest.
steps.content: Open a Chest. You can find a Fist of Darkness randomly in a chest, but this method isn't recommended since only one Fist of Darkness spawns every four hours. If you want to use this method, consider heading to the Cafe or Cursed Ship, looting the chests there, and then switching servers to repeat.

steps.title: Spawning the Darkbeard Raid Boss.
steps.content: Spawning the Darkbeard Raid Boss. When the Fist of Darkness is obtained by the player, head to the Dark Arena and walk into the altar to summon Darkbeard .

steps.title: Obtaining Core Brain from Order.
steps.content: Obtaining Core Brain from Order. The Core Brain is used to unlock the Cyborg , which changes your character's race . Head to the Secret Laboratory room on Hot and Cold Island and insert the Fist of Darkness in the tube.

steps.title: Obtaining the Slayer Skin.
steps.content: Obtaining the Slayer Skin. This functions the same as the Dark Blade, but has a different look. To get the Slayer Skin, you'll need two Fists of Darkness.
